posts.post_content:
Offered here is a very nice 1911 S74-2 Colored Silk of New York Baseball Giants  Fred Snodgrass. Graded a SGC 4 this card has excellent clarity and registration. The color is beautiful with the tougher blue ink backed by a green colored silk. For more information about silks look at S74silk.com 
SOLDnet . 5.99 shipping with tracking
